metadata.notes: Manual profiling using Chrome DevTools and React DevTools Profiler

scenario3_tabSwitching.name: Tab Switching (About → Collaborations → Trades)
observations: INP measured at 88ms (Good - under 200ms threshold)
Input delay: 1ms, Processing: 35ms, Presentation: 52ms
CLS score: 0.24 (Needs improvement - exceeds 0.1 threshold)
Multiple non-composited 'pulse' animations causing layout shifts
Tab switching is responsive and fast overall

scenario4_infiniteScroll.name: Infinite Scroll (Collaborations Tab)
observations: Smooth scrolling with minimal frame drops
Content loaded from 6 to 8 items efficiently
CLS of 0.16 slightly above recommended 0.1 threshold
No significant network requests during scroll
Layout shifts detected during content loading

scenario5_modalOperations.name: Modal Operations (Edit Profile)
observations: INP measured at 157ms (Good - under 200ms threshold)
Modal opens and closes smoothly with no jank
CLS score: 0.00 (Excellent - no layout shifts)
Escape key closes modal reliably
Large form with many fields renders efficiently
Consistent performance across multiple open/close operations

scenario6_shareMenu.name: Share Menu Interaction
observations: INP measured at 134ms (Good - under 200ms threshold)
Share menu opens and closes quickly
CLS score: 0.00 (Excellent - no layout shifts)
Menu items render immediately without delay
Smooth animation transitions
Consistent performance across multiple interactions
